author: Vegeta
quote: Push through the pain. Giving up hurts more.

author: Saitama
quote: I’m just a guy who’s a hero for fun.

author: Kakashi Hatake
quote: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It’s one of the never-ending cycles in life.

author: Yusuke Urameshi
quote: A lesson learned the hard way is a lesson remembered.

author: Gon Freecss
quote: When I say it doesn’t hurt me, that means I can bear it.

author: Shoyo Hinata
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Rintarou Okabe
quote: Remember, no matter how many parallel worlds exist, you only live in this one.

author: Yato
quote: The pain of being forgotten is worse than death.

author: Eren Yeager
quote: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win.

author: Roy Mustang
quote: It’s not wrong to dream. But you have to make it come true.

author: Reigen Arataka
quote: You’re not special. Work hard and don’t expect shortcuts.

author: Gintoki Sakata
quote: The country? The sky? The people? Screw it all. I protect my friends.

author: Ichigo Kurosaki
quote: We are all like fireworks. We climb, shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart.

author: Killua Zoldyck
quote: I’m so tired of killing. I just want to be a kid.

author: Tomoya Okazaki
quote: You should enjoy the little detours. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
quote: We stand in awe before that which cannot be seen. And we respect, with every fiber of our being, that which cannot be explained.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
quote: I am simply one hell of a butler.

author: Kenshin Himura
quote: A sword is a weapon. The art of swordsmanship is learning how to kill. That is the truth.

author: Zero Two
quote: If you’re gonna be my darling, you better be ready for anything.

author: Rem
quote: You are my hero.

author: Meliodas
quote: No matter what lies you tell, you can’t fool your own heart.

author: Shigeo Kageyama
quote: It’s okay to run away. But don’t give up.

author: Holo
quote: When you are experienced in something, whether it's war or love, you stop being afraid.

author: Saber
quote: Even if I am the last one standing, I will fight for what I believe in.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.

author: Himura Kenshin
quote: The strong live and the weak die. That’s the way the world works.

author: Ryuk
quote: You humans are so... interesting.

author: Shikamaru Nara
quote: A lesson learned the hard way is a lesson remembered.

author: Erza Scarlet
quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.

author: Kaname Kuran
quote: The heart is something that cannot be seen, but it is something that must be protected.

author: Shoto Todoroki
quote: Never forget who you want to become.

author: Vash the Stampede
quote: The ticket to the future is always open.

author: Hajime Hinata
quote: Even if the future is uncertain, you can keep moving forward as long as you trust yourself.

author: Kurisu Makise
quote: Theories are nothing more than words. Accept what you’ve seen.

author: Yami Sukehiro
quote: Surpass your limits. Right here. Right now!

author: Akame
quote: No matter how many good deeds you perform, your past sins cannot be erased.

author: Trafalgar Law
quote: You can’t see the whole picture until you look at it from the outside.

author: Mirajane Strauss
quote: Fear isn’t evil. It only allows us to learn our own weaknesses.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
quote: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil’s fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.

author: Rika Furude
quote: You can’t change the past, but you can learn from it.

author: Hange Zoe
quote: Ever since I was a child, I’ve always wanted to see a Titan up close.

author: L Lawliet
quote: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.

author: Chrollo Lucilfer
quote: The only thing we're allowed to do is believe. We can't change anything.

author: Kaori Miyazono
quote: Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going.

author: Inuyasha
quote: I want to be with you. Now and forever.

author: Yuji Itadori
quote: I don’t know how I’ll feel when I’m dead. But I don’t want to regret the way I lived.

author: Shinra Kusakabe
quote: I want to be a hero, so I can protect people.

author: Koro Sensei
quote: The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
